runs.comm: fullish on leg stump, it's flicked towards square leg for a single
down the leg side, turning down further and it's called by the umpire
that one held its line, short of a good length on middle, turned away to midwicket
slightly short outside off, makes room and cuts it to point
looping it on middle and off, gets forward and drives it to midwicket
closes the face of the bat and turns it to short fine leg
bowls it on  good length on the off stump, moves in a hint, gets forward and defends it into the off side
swinging in and went after it, didn't connect well, landed on a good length and he was looking to dispatch it over mid-on, cleared the fielder and they get two
swinging in again, pitched on a good length and Jayawardene, making room, just about manages to chip it over extra cover, just the single this time, he's not connecting them well
swinging in, fullish, Dilshan gets forward and plays it back to the bowler
a fraction short on middle, held his length back there, nudged towards midwicket for a single

Smashed! What a shot, he appeared to have made up his mind there, Bond dragged that short, got a bit of movement into the batsman and Jayawardene pulled him away disdainfully over deep square leg for a big six
pushed off the front foot towards midwicket
pushed it quicker and fuller on the off, plays it hard but straight to extra cover
tossing it up on middle, slog-sweeps it straight towards deep midwicket for a single
lovely shot, McCullum bowled it short, Jayawardene waited for it to turn in, got back, made room and punched it between point and cover
he cut that from well outside leg stump, that pitched on leg and spun down, chopped it towards short third for a single
shortish on the off, cut towards short third man, no single this time
bowled quick, and short, well outside off and Jayawardene missed out there as he tried to upper cut that over third man but could not connect
too short and too wide, repeats the error and Jaywardene ensures he doesn't waste this chance, makes room and slashes him over point for a boundary
bowls it on a good length on middle, tickles it through square leg for a single
bowls it on a good length again, Dilshan waits and guides it to point
nipped back in and Dilshan couldn't get his bat to it as he tried to close the face, was struck on the pads, would have been going down, and they steal a leg bye
pitched up and Jayawardene cashes in, thrashes it Twenty20 style, a cross-batted swipe over midwicket for a boundary
short of a length outside off, tries to cut but can't connect Dilshan again
short outside off again and he makes contact this time but cuts it to point, third man is up
cramps him for room this time, pitches it short on middle, punches it wide of extra cover to give his attacking partner the strike
pitches it up and Jayawardene drives him hard but straight to point
aiming at the blockhole, just outside off, Jayawardene digs it out to mid-on for a single
short of a good length outside off and there is some away movement, tries to cut, misses again, Dilshan is holding up one end
Mahelaaa, full and gets the treatment, enough width for him to cash in on, smacks it hard through extra cover and mid-off for a boundary
chops it behind point for a quick single
short of a length outside off, cut away towards point, can't beat short third man

Dilshan, struggling to pierce the field all this while, gets one targeting the stumps, it's pitched on a length and he tries to heave it over midwicket while his eyes were set on the off side, misses and it crashes into the stumps, his misery ends
slightly short, it's cut to point
bowls it on a good length on the off, pushed towards mid-off for a single
offers a bit of width and he drives it hard towards deep cover for a single
late-cuts that shortish delivery towards third man, he's looking very comfortable out in the middle
round the wicket and he tries to whip it fine, is struck on the thighs and they sneak a single, there was a bit of bat involved
short and wide and it's cut fiercely but Ryder at point dives well to his left and saves a few runs
pitched it up outside off, cracked down the ground to long-off for a single
nicely fielded, it's bowled full and is driven back firmly, Southee manages to get his foot to it, saves the single
flighted on middle, worked towards square leg for a single
that was the arm ball, bowled at 92.5 kmph, it drifted in and just missed leg stump as Sangakkara tried to clip it fine
short of a good length on the off, pushed back to the bowler
punched off the back foot towards long-on for a single
keeping it tight, on middle and leg, played wide of midwicket for a single
gave it a bit of air this time, comes down the track and drives it past a diving midwicket for a single
slower one bowled short on the off, pushed back to the bowler

bowled'im! The pressure got to him there, too many dot balls, that was bowled short on middle, no movement, straight delivery and he tried to pull it through square leg, missed and the stumps took a beating
short of a good length on the off, punched off the back foot to extra cover
shortish on the off, played off the back foot to extra cover
risky, a fraction short and he slapped it just wide of Vettori at mid-off for three runs, brings Jayawardene back on strike
lands on a good length on middle, turns the face just slightly as he drives it back past the bowler for a single
a bit of turn away from a good length, opens the face to guide it just wide of short third man for a single
looping it towards middle, moves across and clips it towards square leg
short on the off, cut towards deep point for a single
short on the off, gets back and jabs it past midwicket for a single
gets forward and defends it into the leg side, hesitates and eventually agrees to a single, Vettori runs to his right, returns a strong throw but Jayawardene looked good to make it back in time
nudges it into the off side for a single
short of a good length, just a fraction outside off, not too much room, chops it to point
similar length, moves away and slaps it back to the bowler
bowled it short on the off, pulled away towards deep midwicket for a single
moved well outside off and tried to paddle it fine, was struck on the pads and it rolled behind square for a couple of runs

superb fielding by Guptill, bowled on a good length but he waits in his crease and cuts it behind point, it appears to be heading to the boundary but Guptill dives full length to his left to drag that back in just in time, just a couple
No stopping that one though, makes room, frees his arms and sends it high and handsome into the stands over long-on
lovely shot, makes room and just chips it effortlessly over extra cover, wide of long-off, for a couple
short of a length, chops it towards short third for a single
comes down the track and drives it to long-off
that appeared to stop on him a touch, really slow this track, slogs it towards deep midwicket for a single
tries to loft that with the turn over extra cover, does so but just about, that was mistimed, a couple more
drops it wide of extra cover for a quick single
back of a length, well outside off, goes for the cut, misses
slower one and he picked it, came off the meat, length ball and he sends it with one swing over long-on into the stands
knocked down into the leg side for a single
pushed past the bowler towards long-on for a single
in the blockhole on middle, pushed back to the bowler

gets to his half-century with a push to extra cover and sneaking a quick single, he's been the one batsman who has looked at ease in this innings and has to usher Sri Lanka now to a competitive score on a slow track
back of a length, trying to make room but was cramped, knocked it into the off side for a single
run down towards third man for a single
slower one and he picked it beautifully, dropped it short did Bond and Jayawardene pulled it hard into that gap between fine leg and deep square leg
makes room to strike that hard towards long-on, gets an inside edge and steals a single in front of square leg
dropped by Hopkins, slower one bowled short on middle, tried to pull it through square, was caught on the glove, Hopkins tried to take it over his head, couldn't hold on and they get a couple
short of a length on the off, punched to extra cover from the crease
cracks it hard over cover for a single into the deep
aiming for the yorker, swipes it through square leg for a single
played away straight to midwicket, the pressure builds
a touch lucky there, full outside off, tries to clear extra cover but ends up slicing it over point and short third man for a boundary
full outside off, eased just wide of extra cover for a single
slower one and he cuts it away fiercely to deep point for a single to keep strike
finds the boundary, bowled it on a length outside off, he bent low and slog-swept it over midwicket to get it wide of long-on
slower through the air, short on the off turning in, almost falls away as he cuts that through point
short on the off, slapped off the back foot to deep point

Ross Taylor takes a beauty at long-on! Didn't quite get to the pitch but gave it a thwack, it appeared as though it would clear Taylor. He was right at the edge, timed his jump perfectly, stuck his right hand out, tapped the ball back in and took it stretching to his right,  It ends an excellent stand after the dismissals of two batsmen who failed to get going
flighted on the off,paddles it towards fine leg for a couple
swept to long leg for a single
Jayawardene's completely at ease out there, full and wide, makes room and slices it over point for a boundary
yorker, he came out and could only dig it out for a single
short of a length, knocks it behind point for a single
full on middle and leg, makes room and pushes it wide of extra cover for a single
straying on the pads, clipped down to fine leg for a single
terrible delivery, full toss on middle, moves across and swings it away behind square leg for a boundary
pushed it quick on the off, played off the front foot to extra cover
driven down the ground towards long-on for a single
took his left foot out of the way and swiped it wide of deep midwicket for a couple of runs
picked his gap, came down the track while simultaneously making room, chips it over extra cover for two more
short ball on middle, pulled through square leg into the deep for a single, this is his best score in T20 internationals
comes down the track and tries to work it through the leg side, is struck on the pads and it lobs back towards the bowler
slower ball and he holed out, he had picked it but couldn't quite clear the fielder, pulled away but straight into the palms of Nathan McCullum at deep midwicket who took a well-judged catch
full outside off, dug out towards extra cover
targeting the blockhole again, squeezes it out towards long-on for a single
another one on target, driven to long-on for a single
fullish, drilled hard but straight to long-on, one more, the right lengths by Southee here
in the blockhole again, plays it out in the leg side towards square leg for a single to keep strike
not a wide at all, full and wide, the batsman had made room and left it alone
makes room again and slices it towards third man for a single
smacked hard, full toss and he cashes in, makes room and thrashes it over the cover boundary for a flat six
this is a bigger ground, bowls it on a good length, charges down the ground to clear long-off but can't, lands straight into the palms of Nathan McCullum
slower one bowled short outside off, keeps a little low, tries to slog that past midwicket, misses, Hopkins fumbles but they decide against the single
another one to Nathan McCullum, a length delivery outside off but a touch too wide for the batsman who's made room, reaches and lofts it straight to long-off
